review_data.title: It's been here for 40 years
review_data.content: The restaurant has been going for decades and it's tired. Pizzas and pastas are decent but the waiters are appalling unless they know you. Locals come here regularly but there is very little competition in the area, so it does need to try hard.

review_data.title: Super gentle service and divided opinion on pizzas
